original_text: A jar of wine vinegar was there, so they soaked a sponge in it, put the sponge on a stalk of the hyssop plant, and lifted it to Jesus’ lips.
korean_text: 거기 신 포도주가 가득히 담긴 그릇이 있는지라 사람들이 신 포도주를 적신 해면을 우슬초에 매어 예수의 입에 대니

sentences.original_text: A jar of wine vinegar was there
so they soaked a sponge in it
put the sponge on a stalk of the hyssop plant
and lifted it to Jesus' lips
